text: They shall cast their silver in the streets, and their gold shall be removed: their silver and their gold shall not be able to deliver them in the day of the wrath of the LORD: they shall not satisfy their souls, neither fill their bowels: because it is the stumblingblock of their iniquity.7.19 removed: Heb. for a separation, or, uncleanness7.19 it isâ€¦: or, their iniquity is their stumblingblock
